page.title: 05ETHNIC CONT'D/CHILD'S DAY
page.content:
MISSION GROVE JUNIOR: THIS SCHOOL PROVIDES A BASE FOR THE TEACHING OF {ISLAMIC CULTURE}AND{READING OF URDU FOR LOCAL CHILDREN.ST.LUKE'S CHURCH, GREENLEAF ROAD: THEY PROVIDE A {PAKISTANI-CHRISTIAN}MEETING PLACE.EDWARD REDHEAD SCHOOL: PROVIDE A CLASSROOM ONE AFTERNOON A WEEK WHERE ASIAN LADIES LEARN{ENGLISH}(THEY HAVE CRECHE FACILITIES
{A DAY IN THE LIFE OF AN ASIAN CHILD
ON FRIDAY MY DAD WAKES ME UP AT 8 O'CLOCK IN THE MORNING. I PUT ON MY CLOTHES. I GET MY{SWIMMING STUFF}READY . I GO AND WASH MY FACE AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST AND COME TO SCHOOL. I PLAY IN THE MORNING AND THEN WE COME INTO CLASS AND{READ.}WHEN WE HAVE FINISHED READING WE DO{GENERAL WORK}UNTIL 10.30 AND THEN WE GO SWIMMING. AFTER THIS WE
